title: Primitive Group
description: A group of primitives that can be drawn together using a single index buffer containing restart values

primitives.description: The indices of the primitives that will be combined and drawn using a single set of indices
primitives.gltf_detailedDescription: The indices of the primitives that will be combined and drawn using a single set of indices. All properties except for `indices` (e.g., `material`, `mode`, and `attributes`) will be obtained from the first primitive in the list, and all other primitives in the list **MUST** have identical values for those properties. The `mode` must be TRIANGLE_FAN, TRIANGLE_STRIP, LINE_LOOP, or LINE_STRIP.

indices.description: The index of the accessor that contains the vertex indices
indices.gltf_detailedDescription: The index of the accessor that contains the vertex indices. The accessor **MUST** have `SCALAR` type and an unsigned integer component type. The indices are permitted to include the maximal index value for the component type, indicating the start of a new primitive.
